text: Hi, I was working with a client who wants a workflow with custom code and populate a dropdown deal property with data received from an API request, the response is an object with sub objects and array, I was planning to use mapped string as enumeration prop, any ideas? thanks

Hi Joe, I'm not sure that I got your issue right, but if you are having trouble working with the response which might be a list of dictionaries with lists of dictionaries inside, I can give you a hand as long as you are using Python. Or maybe you can paste the response here (with fake data) and tell us what you are trying to get from it.
